Class LoginLogoutHelper

                                          HttpSession session,
                                          PrintWriter pw)
        Render configuration for javascript session timeout extender. Callers should include PrivateCmsJsLibrary.CMS_SESSIONTO to take advantage of the configuration code.

        session - the http session.
